task_name: Promoter Activity Prediction Model Construction using Gigantic Parallel Reporter Assay(GPRA) FACS Data（log(YFP/RFP)） for yeast promoters,the sequence is 80bp random DNA,which is inserted into the specific promoter scaffold
task_goal: Construct a deep learning model to predict the relative expression activity ('log(YFP/RFP)' column) of yeast promoters sequences based on their sequence features derived from the Gigantic Parallel Reporter Assay(GPRA) FACS dataset.
task_requirements: The model should be a deep learning model, and the model should be able to predict the relative expression activity of the promoter.

task_dataset.data_type: Gigantic Parallel Reporter Assay(GPRA) FACS Data（log(YFP/RFP)） of yeast promoters,the sequence is 80bp random DNA,which is inserted into the specific promoter scaffold
task_dataset.key_constraint: The sequence data is in the 'seq' column, the length of the input sequence is all 80bp and the target variable is in the 'expr' column.
